DOC.brief_summary: SIAM III multicenter , randomize , prospective , controlled trial patient ST-elevation myocardial infarction receive fibrinolysis < 12 hour onset symptom . All patient receive reteplase , aspirin combination ticlopidin , heparin . Patients early PCI group transfer within 6 hour fibrinolysis PCI . The conservative group receive elective PCI two week fibrinolysis . In total 197 patient include , 163 treat PCI . The primary end point composite ischemic event , death , reinfarction , target lesion revascularization .
DOC.brief_title: Southwest German Interventional Study Acute Myocardial Infarction III
DOC.criteria: Symptoms MI present 12 h ST segment elevation least 1 mm two limb lead , ST segment elevation least 2 mm precordial lead , new bundlebranch block Patients eligible thrombolysis Informed consent participation Secondary iatrogenic infarction Chronic renal insufficiency require dialysis Coronary anatomy unsuitable stent placement Anticipated indication surgical coronary revascularization within 6 month Previous MI area infarct related vessel Infarct related lesion clearly define
